name: Tra Su Sanctuary bird 1 day tour with motorbike
description: If you have chance for seeing Mekong river, do not miss visiting the Tra Su Sanctuary bird. Not only these floating markets that make tourists have unforgettable experience in Mekong river but also Sanctuary bird is the attractive place for sightseeing. For those people who love animals and natural landscapes, Sanctuary bird not only its almost-untouched natural beauty but also its sanctuary of flora and fauna
